body.body:
Here is a set of numbers:

- What is the smallest number of this set? {{interaction_textentryinteraction_5235cef4c0e16662715787}}
- What is the greatest number of this set? {{interaction_textentryinteraction_5235cef4c112c410337711}}
- What is the mean of this set (rounded to two decimal places)? {{interaction_textentryinteraction_5235cef4c1501126252273}}
- What is the standard deviation of this set (rounded to two decimal places)? {{interaction_textentryinteraction_5235cef4c17c7585459184}}
The mean was: {{math_5235cef4bebfb775794727}} and the standard deviation was: {{math_5235cef4becba208774028}}.

The greatest
        one was: {{math_5235cef4bf4cb100517893}} and the standard deviation was: {{math_5235cef4bf582320727070}}.

The smallest
        one was: {{math_5235cef4bfe12649838096}} and the standard deviation was: {{math_5235cef4bfec9201852180}}.

At
        least two incorrect responses. The smallest one was: {{math_5235cef4c075b486761429}}, the greatest one was: {{math_5235cef4c0810672758843}}, the mean was: {{math_5235cef4c089c689629505}} and the standard deviation was {{math_5235cef4c0925242404435}}.
